components/common/compare-checkbox:
<input
  type="checkbox"
  class="input-checkbox sr-only"
  name="products[]"
  value="{{id}}"
  id="compare-{{id}}"
  data-compare-checkbox
  data-compare-id="{{id}}"
  data-compare-title="{{name}}"
  data-compare-url="{{url}}"
  data-compare-price="{{price.without_tax.formatted}}"
  data-compare-thumbnail="{{getImage image 'thumb' (cdn default_image)}}">
components/common/pagination:
{{#if links.length}}
{{#each links}} {{number}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/products/price:
{{#if price.without_tax}}
{{#if price.saved}} {{price.rrp_without_tax.formatted}} {{/if}} {{price.without_tax.formatted}} {{#if price.with_tax}} {{lang 'product.excluding_tax'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if price.with_tax}}
{{#if price.saved}} {{price.rrp_with_tax.formatted}} {{/if}} {{price.with_tax.formatted}} {{#if price.without_tax}} {{lang 'product.including_tax'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if show_savings}} {{#if price.saved}}
{{lang 'product.you_save'}} {{price.saved.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
components/products/product-grid-item:
{{#if brand.name}}
{{brand.name}}
{{/if}}

{{name}}

{{> components/products/price price=price}}
{{#if show_compare}} {{/if}}
